description: Add a touch of creaminess to your dishes with this delicious yoghurt ranch dressing. The added chives and dill elevate this dressing to new heights.
keywords: Salad dressing,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Yoghurt Ranch Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place yoghurt, garlic powder, onion powder, chives, dill and juice in a bowl. Season with pepper. Stir until combined.
